ground_truth_bugs.description: BSD/macOS-specific sed -i '' syntax fails on Linux
updateManyByCredentialId with empty data does not trigger @updatedAt

droid_false_positives.comment: Treat cacheUpdatedAt as string if it comes over tRPC - tRPC serializes Date to string unless transformer configured
droid_false_positives.reasoning: False positive because tRPC in this codebase uses superjson transformer which properly handles Date serialization. The Date type is correct.
